Question: In 1967, Cecil Beaton photographed this person's naked buttocks, a photo that sold at Sotheby's auction house in 1986 for $4,000.
Hints: That same year, it produced a documentary on this person entitled Being Mick.
In 2001, this person released Goddess in the Doorway spawning the hit single "Visions of Paradise".
Allmusic has described this person as "one of the most popular and influential frontmen in the history of rock & roll".
